cat.lump.aq.wikilink.jwpl

Class WikipediaJwpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • Wikipedia
      • cat.lump.aq.wikilink.jwpl.WikipediaJwpl

  • public class WikipediaJwpl
extends Wikipedia
    This class provides methods for initialising a jwpl Wikipedia instance. It includes definitions for images and categories in 13 languages, namely:
    • Arabic
    • Basque
    • Catalan
    • Croatian
    • English
    • Estonian
    • French
    • German
    • Greek
    • Italian
    • Latvian
    • Lithuanian
    • Romanian
    • Slovenian
    • Spanish
    Since:
    Jan 15, 2013
    Version:
    0.1.2
    Author:
    albarron
